column1: Smoque BBQ////They make this beef brisket by smoking long and low. It gets this lovely smoke ring all around
column2: and the flavor is to die for. Then they get their sausages from Mikeska's. Texans will know what that means because Mikeska's is a Texas institution. They know their sausage. And
column3: Smoque gets it from them. (The sausage is a big sellout early in the evening
column4: so try before 7 pm for that).
